Description:
Low Maintenance Living in a Fantastic Location
The Phone Code for this property is: 77032. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
This imposing 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom unit, being the front unit of only 2 on the block (so no Body Corporate fees) is situated in an established quiet pocket of Leopold and only a short walk to Gateway Plaza and all it has to offer. Suitable for downsizers, investors or first home buyers, this property is sure to please. Fully renovated just over 3 years ago it offers two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, wall to wall carpet and quality block out and privacy blinds.
The spacious L shaped kitchen, dining and living area features Blackbutt vinyl plank flooring, downlights, block out and privacy blinds together with a Vulcan wall heater and split system air conditioning. The kitchen includes stainless steel gas stove top, with electric oven and range hood a pantry and plenty of cupboard and bench space.
The impressive bathroom features floor to ceiling tiles, dimmable downlights, freestanding bath, corner shower and glass top vanity. The separate toilet and laundry with storage and external access add the final touches to the floorplan.
Off the living area is a sliding door that leads into a private undercover entertainment area with built in water feature and access to the front yard and single lock up garage with remote controlled roller door. The rear of the property has a garden shed, access to the driveway and an unused area that could be used for additional parking, boat/trailer/caravan storage, veggie garden etc.
Close to shops, schools, medical facilities, sporting grounds, public transport and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula this property ticks all the boxes.
Disclaimer:
Whilst every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, For Sale By Owner (forsalebyowner.com.au Pty Ltd) cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective buyers or tenants need to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
Walk everywhere value plus!
Perfectly positioned within a key Belmont blue chip location, for the savvy first home buyer there can be no better opportunity. Within easy reach of a range of key services this is certainly the lifestyle location you have been seeking.
This delightful light filled residence consists of three generous bedrooms, lounge, dining, kitchen and meals plus updated bathroom. Features include gas ducted heating, polished floor boards, garage with workshop and private rear yard all situated on a generous corner allotment of approx. 581sqm.
Well positioned within easy distance to Barwon River walking tracks, Highton Village, Roslyn Primary, Belmont High School, High Street shopping, public transport and only a short hop to Waurn Ponds Shopping, Aquatic Centre, Deakin University, the Surf Coast and the Ring Road making day to day living a breeze.

Description:
Low Maintenance Lifestyle
This impeccable home, located in the ever popular Highton is perfect for the first home buyer, investor or downsizer alike. Featuring 3 generous bedrooms, the master with WIR & ensuite, both other bedrooms with BIRs and all serviced by the centrally located bathroom and separate toilet. The open plan kitchen features stain-less steel appliances including electric oven, gas cooktop, rangehood & dishwasher offering ample storage with an island bench overlooking the light filled dining and lounge areas.
Extras include
- 2 x split systems
- Remote double garage with internal access
- Undercover alfresco area
- Low maintenance landscaped gardens
Located close to Barrabool Hill Shopping Centre, local schools, public transport and easy access to the Gee-long Ring Road for the commute to Melbourne or weekends down the Great Ocean Road, it wont last long!

Description:
Character Family Home In River Precinct
Nestled on a generous 687m2 (approx) allotment, this character family home is perfectly positioned in Highton's highly sought after river precinct. Only a stone's throw away from the majestic Barwon River walking tracks while being close to Quality Schools, Public Transport, Highton Village Café Precinct, High St Shops, Geelong CBD & Stunning Waterfront and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour.
Boasting charm and character this family home showcases an abundance of natural light throughout. Comprised of three bedrooms all with built in robes, master with ensuite and the remaining bedrooms sharing a central bathroom and separate toilet. The kitchen has been updated with quality stainless steel appliances, gas cook top and loads of bench and cupboard space.
The separate and generous dining area is adjacent to the sunken lounge with vaulted ceilings and has access to the large rear deck making this the perfect place to entertain family and friends. As an added bonus a large rumpus room is located downstairs and offers a very flexible living space for whatever your family requirements may be.
Other notable features include a study, well-proportioned laundry, hydronic heating and split system for your comfort all year around, double lock up garage with workshop, low maintenance back yard and plenty of storage space. Don't miss your opportunity to inspect this rare offering today.

Description:
The perfect downsizer.
Presenting one of the best units Belmont has to offer. This fantastic opportunity will not last long as it is perfectly suited for a range of purchasers, from the first home buyer, downsizer or investor looking to add to their portfolio.
This well-loved home features beautifully polished tiles that run throughout the entire home, two well sized bedrooms, with the master including direct entry into the bathroom and a BIR. A large open plan living & dining area, split system air conditioning and a well presented kitchen in the heart of the home complete with dishwasher, pantry & gas stove.
Step outside into your own undercover alfresco area with a low maintenance yard which has plenty of room for entertaining on the deck area. Other features include a single car garage and ducted heating.
Location is important when buying a home and it really doesn't get much better than this. With Belmont High School, Roslyn Primary School, Woolworths Highton Shopping Centre and public transport only a few minutes drive away. Inspect today before you miss out.

Description:
Absolute Luxury & Class
Nestled on 500m2 this stunning Malishev built family home, sits well and truly a head above the rest. Located close to the majestic Barwon River walking tracks, Geelong's best private schools, Highton Village Café Precinct, Queens Park Golf Course and the M1 taking you to Melbourne in under an hour, ensuring a quiet and convenient lifestyle for now and into the
future.
Be wowed on entry with high ceilings, spotted gum timber flooring and plantation shutters throughout. Offering a practical and flexible floor plan this luxurious family home is comprised of three spacious bedrooms. The master with walk in robe and opulent ensuite, featuring a marble top vanity, oversize shower and on trend matt black fixtures and fittings. The two remaining bedrooms, both with built in robes share an equally impressive central bathroom and separate toilet. Central heating and split system cooling will
keep you comfortable all year around.
The open plan kitchen, dining and living area is well proportioned while being adjacent to the covered alfresco area, making this the perfect place to entertain friends and family. The kitchen features 40mm stone bench tops, breakfast bar, quality appliances, concealed dishwasher and loads of storage and bench space. This living area is complimented by a formal lounge towards the front of the home. A well-proportioned study, remote double lock up garage with rear and secure internal access round out the impressive internal accommodation.
Beautifully manicured gardens and lawns provide a tranquil setting for this magnificent home. If you are looking for luxury, beauty and nothing to do, an inspection is a must.

Description:
Well Located Family Home.
In the centrally located University Estate, this 3 bedroom generous sized home, sitting on 612sqm, offers great value & potential for a family or a steady income for the astute investor.
Step inside to be welcomed by a wide hallway that leads to the master bedroom with ensuite & large walk in robe. The lovely formal lounge room is flooded with natural light through the north facing windows & can be closed off giving two genuine living zones. Continuing down the hallway opens into the spacious casual family living/ dining area which is overlooked by a well appointed kitchen. There is ample bench space for the professional chef, stainless steel appliances including electric wall oven, gas hotplates, dishwasher & pantry.
The additional bedrooms, both with built in robes plus central bathroom & oversized functional laundry are accessed from the family room. The home boasts ducted heating, evaporative cooling ceiling fans. Flowing from the casual living area you will find the fabulous back entertainment area which is sure to become a popular place for friends & family to gather all year round.
A double garage with rear access & large backyard complete the package. Located only minutes from Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre & easy Ringroad access, makes this a worthwhile inspection.

Description:
Peace & Tranquillity Await
This superbly positioned and lovingly cared for brick veneer home is a pleasure to inspect. Positioned on a 650m2 approx. allotment at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of Leopold. Located within close proximity to parks, Gateway Plaza and the Bellarine Rail Trail. This property is the ideal for any growing family or investor.
Upon entering the home, you are greeted by a generous lounge that leads through to the central hub of the home with a large dining / living room adjoined by an updated and functional kitchen. The well- appointed kitchen comprises all stainless-steel appliances, wall oven, electric cook top, dishwasher and ample cupboard and bench space.
Presenting four bedrooms with generous built in robes, main located at the front of the home and offering a private ensuite. The remain bedrooms utilise the central bathroom and separate toilet.
Outdoors offers a large undercover entertaining area that leads through to the magnificently landscaped gardens. An oversized single car garage allowing you enough room to store cars, boats, caravans or trailers and still leave enough space for a workshop.
Added extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a garden shed located in the rear yard.
Dont be the person that misses out on this amazing opportunity.

Description:
Private Resort Style Living in the Heart of Leopold
This is an immaculately kept Wookey built home with the touch and feel of a tropical retreat. This beautifully crafted property oozes class warmth and character. As you walk through the secret garden to the front door you are immediately taken to another world. The home has a flexible floor plan to suit your needs. Offering a stunning lounge & dining which has an amazing north facing aspect with a slow combustion wood heater & reverse cycle split system.
The tastefully modern kitchen is fully equipped with quality Miele appliances & stone benchtops. The adjoining open plan living is complemented by magnificent views of the pool and entertaining area and you will be comfortable in any season with a second reverse cycle split system.
A private main bedroom is an adult hideaway with a lovely renovated ensuite & secluded courtyard to call your own. Even when you are in the shower you will feel like you are in the tropics. Both remaining bedrooms are warm and inviting with great built in robe storage and easy access to the bathroom. Large picture windows from every room provide a wonderful aspect to the pool and garden.
The pool area is resort style living in your backyard and is the best place to enjoy summer nights. The perfectly maintained & lusciously gardens are easy to sustain with an extensive watering system. The double garage with remote control is a good size with and there is also an enclosed carport with side access for all your extra toys. A grassed area at the back is a great area for children to play and has two garden sheds which are neatly disguised among the numerous fruit trees which the new owner will enjoy for years to come. Oh and yes a chook run for you to enjoy fresh eggs daily.
This is a charming rustic modern house ready for you to call home. Throw away your passports as you will be in paradise every day in your own home.
Insights: 42 Darrambal Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
PEACEFUL & PRIVATE SPACIOUS FAMILY HOME
Located in the well-established Ocean Acres Estate this spacious family home is set on a 4007m2 (approx.) allotment offering private and peaceful surroundings giving you the best of both worlds, natural bush setting combined with coastal living.
Favoured by its northern orientation this quality residence with generous room dimensions offers two separate wings of living the west wing houses a separate granny flat with lounge room, bedroom, bathroom, walk in robe and built in study which could convert to a kitchenette, ideal for the family with an elderly parent/s, teenager retreat or to accommodate family or friends when they visit. The south wing, the family home comprises four generous sized bedrooms all with walk in robes, while the masters sizeable en-suite and family bathroom both boast Travertine tiles and Tasmanian oak vanities.
Two separate lounge areas add versatility to the space and provide multiple living choices for the family to relax and unwind, the kitchen with 1200mm gas cooktop, two ovens, stone bench tops and butlers pantry are situated with the main living, this space flows freely to timber glass sliding doors that frame the view and open onto an outdoor undercover alfresco area and solar heated, in-ground 10m x 4m swimming pool, making it ideal for year-round entertaining and social gatherings. The second rumpus room is situated at the rear of the wing and overlooks the rear yard of great dimensions with appeasing landscaped gardens and lawn large enough to kick the footy or backyard cricket.
Other attributes of this amazing property include, gas central heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans, myriad of storage options, quality fixtures, fittings and appliances throughout, storeroom, powder room, 12 fruit trees, oversized double lock up garage and so much more!! This remarkable property offers great lifestyle advantages in the highly sought-after Ocean Acres Estate, only minutes from town and within easy reach of local amenities, youll find it hard to look past this unique proposition. Call us today!!

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME TODAY!
Orientated to provide a north facing aspect and possible ocean views from a second storey is this titled allotment of some 561m2 approx. in the popular Stretton Estate.
The property provides the perfect opportunity to build your dream home with a 17 metre width making design a lot more flexible and less restrictive.
Ideally situated near the Surf Coast Secondary College, Primary Schools, Childcare Centre, The Dunes shopping village, skate park, local sporting reserves and minutes to Whites beach, making this an ideal choice for anyone looking to experience a Surf Coast lifestyle.
The choice is yours to build now and enjoy your new coastal lifestyle sooner rather than later and live the dream!

Description:
Centrally Located On Its Own Title
The Feel:
On its own title in a central location close to Barwon Heads main shopping village, this 2-bedroom cottage-style home presents an ideal lifestyle opportunity for downsizers or investors. Neatly presented with a picket fence, the garden is low maintenance, accented with colourful blooms, a front lawn & private sunny north courtyard. 2 generous bedrooms feature sunny bay windows & built-in robes, with shared access to a family bathroom. Act now to secure easy living this close to the heart of town & river trail walks.
The Facts:
-Centrally located to main street shopping & within close proximity to Barwon River
-Ideally positioned north courtyard for privacy & entertaining
-Single level brick veneer unit with front veranda & rear fenced courtyard
-Neatly presented residence & grounds on its own title
-Comprises 2 well-proportioned bedrooms with full size built-in robes
-Timber kitchen with ample storage, electric oven & cooktop
-Sunny meals area & living room with SSAC & gas wall heater
-Central bathroom with vanity, shower & separate WC
-Accessibility aides throughout
-Single lock up garage with direct access to courtyard & rear door
-Versatile opportunity for those looking to invest or downsize
The Owner Loves.
We rarely used our car, it stays in the garage because we love walking everywhere - to the coffee shop, the supermarket, or along the riverside. There is no better place to come home to relax.

Description:
Character & Convenience Rolled into One!
This Property Is Private Inspection Only Call George 0407050471
This picturesque home offers more than meets the eye combining surprisingly spacious interiors and flexible living options. Set on a large and level 753m2 block, the home is freshly painted inside and out and is ready to welcome new owners. Move-in and enjoy the family-friendly suburb of Belmont right away, or consider the potential to renovate and extend (STCA) if desired.
Double gables and an L shaped porch add to the impeccable street appeal of this well-maintained home. Once inside, vast living spaces showcase stunning period features including soaring high ceilings, fireplaces and original floorboards. Double-hung windows adorned with decorative glass details further enhance the character of this now modernised residence.
Comprising 4 large bedrooms servicing the bedrooms, you'll find a light and airy family bathroom with a shower over bath. The streamlined kitchen is brimming with storage, as is the dining room featuring custom built-in cabinetry.
The sunroom is perfect for use as a home library, study or children's playroom. Internal stairs lead to a studio/4th bedroom, providing another versatile space to suit your needs.
A huge internal laundry, tandem lock-up garage and a covered patio complete the picture of this quality residence, nestled amongst established trees and gardens.
The home is a short stroll to the beautiful Barwon River precinct and the thriving hub of High Street, home to retail outlets, restaurants and cafes. The kids can walk safely to school to Belmont Primary School and the home is also within the catchment of Belmont High School. Easily accessible to the highway, the area is well serviced with bus links and is a quick drive to Geelong.
Exuding a gentle warmth, this is a property where you and the family will instantly feel at home. Call now to arrange an inspection today.

Description:
A Solid Start, Investment or Downsize in Comfort
Positioned conveniently to local shopping facilities & easy access to the CBD & Surf Coast this stunning property provides spacious townhouse living without compromise. Situated at the front, on its own title, this generous residence offers a brilliant opportunity for buyers seeking a sound investment or ideal for those wishing to start out or downsize. Set on a low maintenance allotment, this property features a light filled, neutral interior with tiled front entry and spacious, open planned living with split system air conditioning. Generous dining area and stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances enjoy a northerly aspect and open onto a private courtyard area. Master Bedroom is generous with BIR's, ceiling fan and a contemporary ensuite. The two other generous bedrooms both feature BIR's and are serviced by a sparkling main bathroom. There is a sizeable laundry and separate toilet. Other features include internal access from large remote double garage. Attractively landscaped and great street appeal, this townhouse is available now for occupation or alternatively is the perfect opportunity to add to your portfolio.

Description:
This Could Be The One
Nestled within the family friendly Estuary Estate, this property is sure to exceed your expectations. Whether you are looking to break into the market with your first home, invest or wishing to downsize, this immaculate property is worth your attention.
Positioned in an ideal location, within a short stroll of local parks & playgrounds, sporting ovals and the ever-expanding Gateway Plaza, this property offers so much more than just a desirable location.
This beautiful home comprises four generous sized bedrooms, main complete with walk through robe and private ensuite. While remaining bedrooms utilize the stylish central bathroom and separate toilet. The spacious and light filled open plan living, kitchen and dining area, all overlook the superbly decked entertaining area. The fully equipped kitchen will leave you wanting nothing more. Complete with a stainless-steel 900mm free standing oven/ cooktop, dishwasher, built-in pantry, mirrored splash back and an abundance of bench space offering a large island breakfast bar. Offering an additional separate living area located at the front of the home, perfect for the whole family.
Just a step out through the glass stacker doors and you are standing on the fantastic decked entertaining area, making indoor outdoor entertaining easy. All while overlooking the low maintenance and secure yard.
Added extras include double lock up garage with internal access, ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fan, downlights throughout, indoor skylight, garden shed for extra storage and beautifully landscaped gardens.
With the ever-expanding Gateway Shopping Centre just minutes away, easy access to the Geelong CBD and the many amenities of the Bellarine Peninsula. This home is immaculate throughout out and leaves nothing left to do. A perfect opportunity, dont miss out on this one!

Charming Family Living in The Highton Hills

- Enjoy easy access to schools, public transport, Barwon River
- Formal lounge and dining room create a wealth of space
- Open plan living zone and rumpus room flow to the alfresco
- Kitchen with b/in pantry, island bench with stone benchtop
- S/steel apps inc. a Siemens pyrolytic oven and gas cooktop
- Generous master bedroom features a w/in robe and en suite
- Two additional bedrooms with b/in robes and versatile study/fourth bedroom
- Ducted heating and split-system air conditioner
- Ducted vacuum, security system, sensor lights outside.
- North-facing yard features an automatic sprinkler system
- Remote double lock-up garage with backyard vehicle access

Description:
Luxury near new and striking design
Striking Dennehy built home set on one level allowing ease of liveability across all generations, is designed with passive solar aspects on a north facing block. Features an established garden and alfresco deck allowing for year round entertaining, setting a new standard in luxury with polished concrete floors, extra wide hallway, designer kitchen and open plan living. The degree of craftsmanship and finish in this near new home cannot be overstated; a robust palette of natural materials is the perfect balance to its bold, clean lines and thoroughly modern aesthetic.
- Wonderful sense of unity and flow, open plan living and dining areas
- Stunning and soaring interior spaces; easy connection to the outdoors
- Marble chefs' kitchen, Technika appliances and an abundance of storage.
OPEN BY APPOINTMENT ONLY
For enquiries please call or text Donna Dacres-Mannings on 0420 314 609

Description:
Downsize, First Home Or Weekend Getaway - The Choice Is Yours...
Private Inspections - By Appointment Only
Nestled in one of Torquays most established pockets, this private, low maintenance, renovated home ticks all the boxes!
Located within a short stroll to both Whites Beach and Fishermans Beach tucked into the quite Grange Crescent, awaits your new leafy abode.
Upon entering the secure and discrete gate via one of its two courtyards is this two bedroom brick property on its own title, with multiple RC units, a gas log fire and a sun drenched north facing dining area making for comfortable living & entertaining all year round!
With local bus stops just around the corner, beach access moments away, Loch Ard Drive shops a short walk up the road - convenience and easy living come straight to mind.
With low maintenance gardens, energy efficient and cost saving solar panels, a secure single car garage - there will be nothing left to do except move in, sit back and enjoy the pristine beaches of Torquay and surrounds, a luxurious relaxed new life is waiting for you.
Internal area
74m²
Insights: 2/29 Grange Crescent, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 13 other 2 bedroom unit in Torquay have recently been sold.
